body:
Dear Technical Evaluation Panel,

Attached is the Candidate Scoring Metrics Report generated via the Cognitive Document Intelligence Platform. This report provides weighted scores based on skill relevance, project exposure, certifications, and resume content alignment to the JD.

Use this data to:
- Prioritize technical interviews
- Tailor interview focus areas based on scoring breakdown
- Accelerate evaluation cycles through data-driven pre-screening

If you need additional analytics or scoring logic changes, feel free to reach out to the project team.
